# DmiProperty.MemoryDevice.ModuleProductId property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property.

The two-byte module product ID found in the SPD of this memory device.

Key Composition

* Structure: MemoryDevice
* Property: ModuleProductId
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: UInt16

Remarks

3.2+

public static IPropertyKey ModuleProductId { get; }
